_header: Grant me to teach Lord that been unwise
_description: Prayer of the Seven Ghostly Works of Mercy — one stanza rhyme royal

Bod549.First Lines:
Graunt me to teche lord that ben vnwyseAnd to Counseyll well ham
                    that han nede…
Bod549.Last Lines:
…Alle tribulacions to suffre eselyAnd for alle Crysten to pray
                    bysyly
